title: Amsterdam Falafelshop - L'Enfant Plaza
typeOfFood: Buffet, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg-options available. Franchise falafel shop offering top-it-yourself falafel and Dutch-style fries with dipping sauces. Gluten-free suitable except the pita. Located in the south food court. Fryers are only used for falafel, and other vegetarian items are segregated. Was originally veg but added meat in 2015.
